item.title: Automating Folder Sync Between Private and Public Repositories Using GitHub Actions
item.description: Background I will discuss the automation of folder sync between private and public repositories using GitHub actions. My prior experience with automation techniques such as these is limited. However, I believe that this experience has helped me learn more about workflows and has also helped me with my personal website. As I transitioned to using Hugo for building my website, I decided to create a new private repository for developmental purposes.
